definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: For decanters fitted with a bowl speed inverter, start up must always be done at low speed.
sentences.chinese: 对配有转鼓变速器的离心机，必须以低速启动。

sentences.english: This model is available with automatic transmission.
sentences.chinese: 这种装有自动变速器的车有现货。

sentences.english: The transmission also contains a set of gears that can reverse the direction of the wheels.
sentences.chinese: 变速器还有一套使得车轮反向运动的齿轮。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, it has been fitted with a “virtual” one.
sentences.chinese: 不过，它倒是有一个“虚拟”变速器。

sentences.english: Unscrew threaded joint securing transmission cross member to body.
sentences.chinese: 拧下将变速器横梁固定到车身的螺纹接头。

sentences.english: This Push-Pull is the second generation product which we develop dependently.
sentences.chinese: 本产品当初是为变速器开发的推拉型电磁阀。

sentences.english: Remove switch for reversing light from the transmission.
sentences.chinese: 从变速器上拆下倒车灯开关。

sentences.english: If you have an auto transmission, you’re lucky.
sentences.chinese: 如果你用的是自动变速器，那就幸福喽。

sentences.english: Power is driven to all four wheels by a five- speed automatic transmission.
sentences.chinese: 电力驱动所有四个轮子的五速自动变速器。

sentences.english: You can start with the fork then look at the wheels and rear derailleur .
sentences.chinese: 你可以开始与叉然后再看看后面的车轮和变速器。

sentences.english: Both the automatic and the dual-clutch transmissions feature steering wheel -mounted paddle shifters.
sentences.chinese: 无论是自动和双离合器变速器功能方向盘式换档。

sentences.english: Cars equipped with automatic transmissions normally do not have a clutch.
sentences.chinese: 装有自动变速器的汽车一般不需要离合器。

sentences.english: The propeller shaft is a drive shaft to carry the power from the transmission to the rear-wheel axles.
sentences.chinese: 传动轴是将动力从变速器传送到后桥的驱动轴上。

sentences.english: Close-ratio six-speed transmission delivers seamless power and maximum acceleration.
sentences.chinese: 特写比六速变速器提供无缝功率和最大加速度。

sentences.english: In the second chapter I analyze the system structure of double clutch transmission.
sentences.chinese: 第二章分析了双离合器式自动变速器的系统构成。
所有4缸机配备4速自动变速器。
